name: Etherym Sacred Paradise
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Etherym" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Etherym Sacred Paradise" once per turn. You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters. (Quick Effect) You can banish 2 monsters from your GY; this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects until the end of this turn.
